trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-Service
trans-unit.target: Get-Service

trans-unit.source: Get-Service
trans-unit.target: Get-Service

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Gets the services on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得本機電腦或遠端電腦上的服務。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Default (Default)
trans-unit.target: 預設值 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: DisplayName
trans-unit.target: DisplayName

trans-unit.source: InputObject
trans-unit.target: InputObject

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Service** cmdlet gets objects that represent the services on a local computer or on a remote computer, including running and stopped services.
trans-unit.target: **Get-service** cmdlet 會取得代表本機電腦上或遠端電腦上，包括執行及停止服務之服務的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can direct this cmdlet to get only particular services by specifying the service name or display name of the services, or you can pipe service objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以直接這個指令程式可取得特定的服務，藉由指定服務名稱或顯示名稱的服務，或您可以透過管道傳送到此指令程式的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get all services on the computer
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 取得電腦上的所有服務

trans-unit.source: This command gets all of the services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得所有服務的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: It behaves as though you typed `Get-Service *`.
trans-unit.target: 它的行為如同您輸入 `Get-Service *`。

trans-unit.source: The default display shows the status, service name, and display name of each service.
trans-unit.target: 預設顯示會展示狀態、服務名稱及每個服務的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get services that begin with a search string
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 取得服務的搜尋字串的開頭

trans-unit.source: This command retrieves services with service names that begin with WMI (the acronym for Windows Management Instrumentation).
trans-unit.target: 此命令會擷取服務名稱開頭為 WMI （Windows Management Instrumentation 的縮略字）。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Display services that include a search string
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 顯示服務，其中包含搜尋字串

trans-unit.source: This command displays services with a display name that includes the word network.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示包含 word 網路的顯示名稱的服務。

trans-unit.source: Searching the display name finds network-related services even when the service name does not include "Net", such as xmlprov, the Network Provisioning Service.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋顯示名稱會尋找網路相關的服務，即使服務名稱並不包含 "Net"，例如 xmlprov (網路佈建服務)。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Get services that begin with a search string and an exclusion
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 取得以搜尋字串和一個排除項目開頭的服務

trans-unit.source: These commands get only the services with service names that begin with win, except for the WinRM service.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令會取得服務名稱開頭贏得勝利，除了 WinRM 服務的服務。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Display services that are currently active
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 顯示目前使用中的服務

trans-unit.source: This command displays only the services that are currently active.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示目前使用中的服務。

trans-unit.source: It uses the **Get-Service** cmdlet to get all of the services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 **Get-service** cmdlet 來取得電腦上的所有服務。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) passes the results to the Where-Object cmdlet, which selects only the services with a Status property that equals Running.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 會將結果傳遞至 Where-object cmdlet，會選取 Status 屬性等於執行的服務。

trans-unit.source: Status is only one property of service objects.
trans-unit.target: Status 只是服務物件的一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: To see all of the properties, type `Get-Service | Get-Member`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看所有內容，請輸入 `Get-Service | Get-Member`。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Get the services on a remote computer
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 取得遠端電腦上的服務

trans-unit.source: This command gets the services on the Server02 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得 Server02 遠端電腦上的服務。

trans-unit.source: Because the *ComputerName* parameter of **Get-Service** does not use Windows PowerShell remoting, you can use this parameter even if the computer is not configured for remoting in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 因為 *ComputerName* 參數 **Get-service** 不會使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能，您可以使用這個參數，即使電腦未針對 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: List the services on the local computer that have dependent services
trans-unit.target: 範例 7︰ 列出服務的本機電腦上具有相依服務

trans-unit.source: This example lists the services on the computer that have dependent services.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會列出電腦上的服務所依存的服務。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the **Get-Service** cmdlet to get the services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 **Get-service** cmdlet 來取得電腦上的服務。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator (|) sends the services to the **Where-Object** cmdlet, which selects the services whose **DependentServices** property is not null.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 會傳送至服務 **Where-object** 指令程式，以選取的服務其 **DependentServices** 屬性不是 null。

trans-unit.source: Another pipeline operator sends the results to the Format-List cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 另一個管線運算子會將結果傳送給 Format-List Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The command uses its *Property* parameter to display the name of the service, the name of the dependent services, and a calculated property that displays the number of dependent services that each service has.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用其 *屬性* 參數來顯示服務的名稱、 相依的服務，並會顯示每個服務擁有相依服務的數字的計算的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: Sort services by property value
trans-unit.target: 範例 8︰ 排序服務的屬性值

trans-unit.source: This command shows that when you sort services in ascending order by the value of their **Status** property, stopped services appear before running services.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示，當您排序的值依遞增順序排列的服務其 **狀態** 屬性中，執行中服務之前出現停止的服務。

trans-unit.source: This happens because the value of Status is an enumeration, in which Stopped has a value of 1, and Running has a value of 4.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為 Status 的值是列舉型別中的已停止具有值為 1，並執行中的值為 4。

trans-unit.source: To list running services first, use the *Descending* parameter of the Sort-Object cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 列出正在執行服務時，首先，使用 *遞減* Sort-object cmdlet 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Example 9: Get services on multiple computers
trans-unit.target: 範例 9︰ 取得多部電腦上的服務

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Get-Service** cmdlet to run a Get-Service Winrm command on two remote computers and the local computer ("localhost").
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **Get-service** cmdlet 來執行 Get-service Winrm 命令在兩部遠端電腦和本機電腦 ("localhost")。

trans-unit.source: The command runs on the remote computers, and the results are returned to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會在遠端電腦上執行，結果會傳回到本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator (|) sends the results to the **Format-Table** cmdlet, which formats the services as a table.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 將結果傳送到 **Format-table** 指令程式，以表格方式格式化服務。

trans-unit.source: The **Format-Table** command uses the *Property* parameter to specify the properties displayed in the table, including the **MachineName** property.
trans-unit.target: **Format-table** 命令會使用 *屬性* 參數來指定顯示在資料表中，內容包括 **MachineName** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Example 10: Get the dependent services of a service
trans-unit.target: 範例 10︰ 取得服務的相依服務

trans-unit.source: This command gets the services that the WinRM service requires.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得 WinRM 服務所需的服務。

trans-unit.source: The command returns the value of the **ServicesDependedOn** property of the service.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會傳回的值 **ServicesDependedOn** 服務的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Example 11: Get a service through the pipeline operator
trans-unit.target: 範例 11︰ 透過管線運算子將取得的服務

trans-unit.source: This command gets the WinRM service on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得本機電腦上的 WinRM 服務。

trans-unit.source: This example shows that you can pipe a service name string (enclosed in quotation marks) to **Get-Service**.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例，您可以使用管線將服務名稱的字串 （加上引號） 至 **Get-service**。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Gets the services running on the specified computers.
trans-unit.target: 取得在指定電腦上執行的服務。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 預設是本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an IP address, or a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 NetBIOS 名稱、 IP 位址或遠端電腦的完整的網域名稱 (FQDN)。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, type the computer name, a dot (.), or localhost.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本機電腦，請輸入電腦名稱、 句點 （.） 或 localhost。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此參數不必依賴 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *ComputerName* parameter of **Get-Service** even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *ComputerName* 參數 **Get-service** 即使您的電腦未設定為執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: -DependentServices
trans-unit.target: -DependentServices

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets only the services that depend upon the specified service.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得指定的服務而定的服務。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet gets all services.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 cmdlet 會取得所有服務。

trans-unit.source: -DisplayName
trans-unit.target: -顯示名稱

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, the display names of services to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 以字串陣列，指定要擷取之服務的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet gets all services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 cmdlet 會取得所有服務的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, a service or services that this cmdlet excludes from the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定為字串陣列、 服務或服務，這個指令程式排除作業。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *名稱* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as "s*".
trans-unit.target: 輸入名稱元素或模式，例如 "s*"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, a service or services that this cmdlet includes in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定為字串陣列、 服務或作業中包含的這個指令程式的服務。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *名稱* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as "s*".
trans-unit.target: 輸入名稱元素或模式，例如 "s*"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies **ServiceController** objects representing the services to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定 **ServiceController** 代表要擷取之服務物件。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the objects, or type a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 輸入包含物件的變數，或輸入可取得物件的命令或運算式。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a service object to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過管道傳送到此指令程式的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the service names of services to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定要抓取之服務的服務名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet gets all of the services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 cmdlet 會取得所有服務的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: -RequiredServices
trans-unit.target: -RequiredServices

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets only the services that this service requires.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得此服務所需的服務。

trans-unit.source: This parameter gets the value of the **ServicesDependedOn** property of the service.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會取得的值 **ServicesDependedOn** 服務的屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet gets all services.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 cmdlet 會取得所有服務。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController, System.String
trans-unit.target: System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController、 System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a service object or a service name to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將服務物件或這個指令程式的服務名稱。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController
trans-unit.target: System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns objects that represent the services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會傳回代表電腦上的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Get-Service** by its built-in alias, "gsv".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以參考 **Get-service** 內建的別名"gsv"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet can display services only when the current user has permission to see them.
trans-unit.target: 只有當目前的使用者具有權限，才能查看它們時，這個指令程式會顯示服務。

trans-unit.source: If this cmdlet does not display services, you might not have permission to see them.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個指令程式不會顯示服務，您可能沒有權限，才能查看它們。

trans-unit.source: To find the service name and display name of each service on your system, type `Get-Service`.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找服務名稱，並顯示您系統上的每個服務的名稱，輸入 `Get-Service`。

trans-unit.source: The service names appear in the Name column, and the display names appear in the DisplayName column.
trans-unit.target: 服務名稱會出現在 Name 欄位中，而顯示名稱會出現在 DisplayName 欄位中。

trans-unit.source: When you sort in ascending order by status value, "Stopped" services appear before "Running" services.
trans-unit.target: 當您依狀態值以遞增順序進行排序時，"Stopped" 服務會顯示在 "Running" 服務之前。

trans-unit.source: The Status property of a service is an enumerated value in which the names of the statuses represent integer values.
trans-unit.target: 服務的 Status 屬性是一個列舉值，其中狀態的名稱會呈現為整數值。

trans-unit.source: The sort is based on the integer value, not the name.
trans-unit.target: 排序是根據整數值，而不是根據名稱。

trans-unit.source: "Running" appears before "Stopped" because "Stopped" has a value of "1", and "Running" has a value of "4".
trans-unit.target: "Running" 會出現在 "Stopped" 之前，因為 "Stopped" 的值為 "1"，而 "Running" 的值為 "4"。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: New-Service

trans-unit.target: Restart-Service

trans-unit.source: Resume-Service
trans-unit.target: Resume-Service

trans-unit.target: Set-Service

trans-unit.source: Start-Service
trans-unit.target: Start-Service

trans-unit.source: Stop-Service
trans-unit.target: Stop-Service

trans-unit.target: Suspend-Service
